channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rich Americans prefer Harris over Trump—but want a second passport no matter who wins
item.description: Gaining residency or citizenship abroad is a "political statement" for wealthy Americans.

item.title: First-time unemployment claims rose more than forecast in latest week
U.S. factory orders register third decline in past four months
WNBA commissioner Cathy Engelbert is leading the league to historic highs. Critics wonder if she’s fully seizing the moment
item.description: As the WNBA's banner season wraps up, Engelbert faces more pressure than ever.

item.title: Europe’s automobile makers may have hit bottom: Barclays
WNBA commissioner Cathy Engelbert’s job is a delicate balancing act as the league soars in popularity
item.description: The league is caught in a messy middle between booming interest and its relatively small business.

item.title: Digital bank Revolut slams Meta over approach to scams, says tech giant should compensate victims
item.description: British fintech Revolut criticized Meta over its approach to tackling fraud and said the U.S. tech giant should directly compensate fraud victims.

item.title: JPMorgan says this EV charging stock could surge nearly 80%
item.description: JPMorgan thinks the company's business model of both owning and operating its fast electric vehicle chargers can send the stock soaring.

item.title: Central banks delivered more rate cuts in Sept. than in any postpandemic month
Tesla recalls more than 27,000 Cybertrucks to fix rear-view camera delay
item.description: Tesla said on Thursday it would recall more than 27,000 Cybertrucks due to delayed rear-view camera images that could impair driver visibility.

item.title: Oil market faces a rude awakening if Iran’s energy infrastructure is targeted, analysts say
item.description: Oil markets are being too complacent given the risk of major supply disruptions in the Middle East, analysts told CNBC on Thursday.

item.title: Latina wage gap widens to $1.3 million for full-time and part-time workers
item.description: Latinas working full time, year-round were typically paid just 58 cents for every dollar paid to white, non-Hispanic men.

item.title: Economic calendar: U.S. jobless-claims and factory-orders data coming up
BBVA plans Visa-backed stablecoin launch in 2025
item.description: The Spanish bank is pushing further into the blockchain space through a partnership with the payments giant.

item.title: Boomers are the wealthiest generation that’s ever lived—and millennials are the ‘biggest losers’ thanks to economic crises
item.description: "Even with the same savings behavior, no generation can match the wealth accumulation enjoyed by the Baby Boomers."
